Beast.`` Earlier this week, the Daily Mirror UK and others reported that Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt are in the process of adopting a child from Haiti,'' Waldman said in a statement. There is no truth to these rumors.`` Rather, Angelina Jolie is focused on enhancing the welfare and legal protection of children within Haiti. As such, she has been meeting with government of Haiti officials, Haitian legal experts and non-governmental organizations regarding a new initiative of the Brad Pitt Foundation. The recently launched Angelina Jolie Legal Fellows Program will assist the justice system in Haiti to improve child protection, the statement added. Angelina Jolie , 35, and partner Brad Pitt have six children, three of whom- Maddox, Pax and Zahara- were adopted from Cambodia, Vietnam and Ethiopia respectively. The
